Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RayMessageUntitled1_Desc:
"Last week it was Jenkins forgetting to replace the urinal cakes after a single use, yesterday it was Elsa for showing up to work early, today it’s me because Lilly H asked for Chicken Alfredo. I said we don’t make that here. Her father (guy looked like Sasquatch, btw) demanded to speak to a manager. I get Dennis. Dennis asks me why I don’t just get her what she wants. I say we don’t have Chicken Alfredo! Dennis fires me on the spot. 
Jokes on him though - Turns out our new S.T.A.F.F. bots (the “better employees”) aren’t programmed to make Chicken Alfredo, so HQ fired him for firing me.
Sweet revenge. Thanks, Lilly!"
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_StaffUntitled1_Descripti: ATTENTION EMPLOYEES - Good news! Due to the success of the S.T.A.F.F. project, we will no longer need nighttime employee coverage. We will be reducing nighttime hours effective immediately. Enjoy the additional time spent with your families.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_FoodStorage_Description: ATTENTION KITCHEN STAFF - All food materials must be securely stored at closing. Chica has been caught eating from the kitchen garbage after hours. The maintenance repairs are costly and will come out of kitchen staff paychecks. - MANAGEMENT
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ChicaBoss2_Description: ATTENTION KITCHEN STAFF - Parts and Service is concerned that Chica will suffer heavy damage if she ever gets caught in the trash compactor.  Always double check the compactor before use. Do not use to compactor to dispose of pizza, pizza flavored items, or pizza scented materials (especially Monty's Mystery Mix!). Otherwise, her replacement cost will come out of your paycheck.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_StaffParty1_Description: Are you going to the staff party? I don't want to stick around after my 14 hr shift, but I don't want to get laid off if I don't show up.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_SinkholeUntitled3_Descri: CONSTRUCTION UPDATE -  Today, we broke through the foundation and found what looks like an old elevator shaft. Someone must have known about this, right? There's something down there pulling power. I'm taking a team down in the morning to check it out.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_SinkholeUntitled1_Descri: CONSTRUCTION UPDATE - Every day there's a new problem. We pour a new section of track and as soon as it dries, we start to see cracks. I am worried we are building over a sinkhole here. Before construction was approved, there was a site evaluation, right?
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_SinkholeUntitled2_Descri: CONSTRUCTION UPDATE - We keep getting these brown outs so I got fed up and did a little investigation. It looks like something is drawing a massive amount of power from the worksite. We've traced a high voltage cable that disappears right into the foundation. There is definitely something under us. We're going to bore back into the foundation and find out what it is.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_DrinkFizzyFaz_Descriptio: COPY FOR APPROVAL: Hey kids! Do you like Fizzy Faz? Think you can drink every flavor of Fizzy Faz in one day? Take the Superstar challenge! Grape, Lemonade, Cherry... Your Fazwatch keeps track of all your purchases. Drink them all. Be first! Be the raddest kid on your block.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_NightTerrors_Description: CUSTOMER COMPLAINT - My son never had sleeping problems. But after spending an evening in the daycare, he refuses to sleep with the lights out anymore! He just cries and cries. And then when I do let him keep the lights on, he wets the bed!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ComplaintUntitled1_Descr: CUSTOMER COMPLAINT - The pizza we ordered was weird. Some pieces were different sizes or didn't fit together. One slice even had different toppings. Did you recycle the old pizza from the trash? I am never coming back here unless I am given some sort of major discount. - Angry Mom
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_PartyFoul_Description: CUSTOMER COMPLAINT - We paid for the Glam Freddy Mega Deluxe Party Package and Freddy broke down as soon as he got on stage. We paid to have him at the table and sing happy birthday. He was supposed to give her the cake!  My daughter's birthday has been ruined. I demand a refund.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ComplaintUntitled3_Descr: CUSTOMER COMPLAINT - Why did you reopen? Everyone remembers what happened to those kids.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Complaint2_Description: CUSTOMER COMPLAINT - You should fire Dave. He sucks.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_DJMM_Description: Congratulations on your installation of the new and improved DJMM. The DJMM features eons of musical enjoyment using a patented technique called 'improv' (royalty free!). No two songs are ever the same. Save a fortune on cleanup! Using a series of connected tubes, the DJMM can run cleaning routines between set lists. If the need ever arises, activate the new "bouncer mode".  (Warning: Bouncer mode still under development. Use of the bouncer mode will void your warranty.)
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RoxyBoss3_Description: EQUIPMENT REQUEST - We are running out of test bots for the raceway. At this point we are down to a single Driver Assist bot. For safe keeping, we are storing it at the back of the raceway near the Northwest stairs.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ChicaBoss4_Description: ERRANT BEHAVIOR REPORT - Chica's personality chip has always been a bit 'quirky', but the new Pizza Flavored Monty Mystery Mix Slushy Syrup has adverse effects on her programming. She has attacked patrons, employees and S.T.A.F.F. for it. It is recommended that Monty Mystery Mix should be recalled before we're inundated with lawsuits.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_MontyMischief_Descriptio: ERRANT BEHAVIOR REPORT - Monty didn't show up for the main stage performance again. We found him in the same place we always do, the catwalks over Monty Golf.  We can't have a repeat of last month. Someone hit the hole in one and the hurricane bucket knocked him down. Both legs were broken and required emergency parts and service work.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Chasingcars_Description: ERRANT BEHAVIOR REPORT - Roxy never misses a race. She must be frying her circuits waiting for the raceway to reopen. Every time there is a test run on the track she gets in the way. If she keeps getting in the way, the track will never get fixed.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_NightShiftUntitled1_Desc: EXIT INTERVIEW - Of course, I got stuck in the arcade. Every time I exit the Security Office, I get locked out. If it's not my low clearance level, then I need a stupid Party Pass. I'm on the security team. Shouldn't I have access to everything? I swear, those things are messing with me. This place is not safe. Give me my $100 and I'll go.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitches8_Descript: EXIT INTERVIEW: They are working together. The arcades. They are hiding something. The glitches. Glitch them all at the same time... then the Princess will recognize me. She's testing me. I am not yet worthy. The others are protecting it. Let me stay! I am so close! Just one more night, please! I can save the Princess!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_FreddyIntro_Description: Hello, Gregory. It is me, Freddy. I will escort you to the main entrance. However, I am unable to leave this room. You should have no problem. There is a button on the wall that will open the door to the back room. I will make it accessible to you now.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_HURRICANE_Description: Hurricane Hole in One!!! Get a hole in one on the 18th hole! Fun fun fun! The area is showered by plastic balls!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_VanessaUntitled2_Descrip: INTERVIEW NOTES - As requested, here are my notes on today's Chief Security Officer interview. While Vanessa seemed eager and bright, she doesn't appear to have any relevant background experience. I realize the recommendation came from the top, but we need someone who has run security for a facility of this scale. I do not recommend her for this position.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled6_: INVENTORY CHECK - There is no record of a PQ3 arcade, yet there is a cabinet tucked away in Fazerblast. Won't work though. Sometimes I hear it in attract mode, but I have never seen a single image displayed. Too creepy. Leave it where it is. At least until I play part 1 and 2.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_TornPaper_Description: It is there, but you can't see. Alone in the dark. I found the key.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ChicaVoiceBoxUntitled1_D: MAINT LOG: CHICA - Don't let her sing! Messes with the navigation of the other bots. Horrible results when she sang during live performance. S.T.A.F.F. bots dropping serving trays, chaos, guest injuries, 12 lawsuits. Experimental voice box test failed. Replacement advised.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_MontyClawsUntitled1_Desc: MAINT LOG: MONTY - Montgomery's Claw upgrades allow him to play the bass. Following performances, he mostly uses them to cause damage. The fence repairs are getting costly.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RoxyEyesUntitled1_Descri: MAINT LOG: ROXY - Roxy sees things differently than the others. This upgrade was meant to help her win races. However, there are some side effects. Sometimes she will stare and talk to the other bots through walls.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled2_: MAINTENANCE LOG - Chica Feeding Frenzy in the bakery won't turn off. Even when unplugged, the game just kept running. There is no way it has that much residual charge.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitches7_Descript: MAINTENANCE LOG - I did it!. I did what you wanted! I beat parts 1 and 2. Why won't you turn on? What else is there? Tell me!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled5_: MAINTENANCE LOG - Princess Quest 2 - Won't boot properly. No idea why! Shuts down when I try to play? Like it's personal. Doesn't matter anyway. I still haven't found PQ1.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled1_: MAINTENANCE LOG - The BB World game has been acting up. Customers have complained that it starts to glitch over time. I headed to the theater to fix it and now it's gone. I never saw a move request so it should still be there somewhere.  I guess I'll check again after the company meeting.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled4_: MAINTENANCE LOG - There's a Princess Quest 1 machine somewhere in the building. An actual standup arcade! I guess the devs pulled it from that old mobile game. Why port to arcade?
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ArcadeGlitchesUntitled3_: MAINTENANCE LOG - Why is the Monty Golf AR-Cade in the mini golf course? It makes absolutely no sense. It seems to work ok otherwise.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_MontyBoss1_Description: MAINTENANCE REPORT - I still can't find what is making all the clanging noise in the AC system. This is the fifth visit this week. If I could reach that stupid vent behind the exercise maze room, I could get to the catwalks over Gator Golf and take a look. Maybe someone who works in Mazercise knows how.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Re-theme_Description: MANAGEMENT REPORT - The bowling alley needs a re-theme. While most of the Bonnie art was removed, kids keep asking, "Where's Bonnie?" Do we have an officially approved response?
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Bonniereplacement_Descri: MANAGEMENT REPORT - With Bonnie out of commission, we are making Monty the new bass player. Parts and Service has already done the proper adjustments. This could be a good thing. Monty could be even more popular than Bonnie.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_MontyBoss2_Description: MAZERCISE INSTRUCTIONS - Move blue to the corner. You should be able to work it out from there.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_UpgradeMachine1_Descript: My cousin worked here. He said magnets screw with the ticket machines. Just head up to Faz Pad. You can get down to customer service through the back door and grab a stack of tickets. I'll be waiting for you outside. If you hear any robots, just hide until they leave. You'll be fine.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Vanessa1_Description: NEW HIRE SUMMARY - Head Security Guard. No prior qualifications. Internal reference (name withheld).
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Hidethemix_Description: RECALL NOTICE - Please take all Monty Mystery Mix to the frozen ice cream storage behind the Bowling alley. Additional instructions to follow.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_StaffParty2_Description: REMINDER TO ALL EMPLOYEES - The all staff meeting is this Thursday night at 11:30PM. All "service team" attendance is mandatory. There will be cake!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RoxyBoss1_Description: Roxy did it again. Another braindead S.T.A.F.F. bot decapitated because it got in her way on the racetrack. I'm getting really sick of trudging over to West Arcade to fix these things. Why isn't there a S.T.A.F.F. repair station any closer? At least I have an extra Dance Pass so I won't get locked out again.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RoxyWeakness_Description: Roxy has been jumping down on the racetrack. So you need to use the cars to run her over!
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_RoxyMessage_Description: Roxy keeps ripping the heads off the S.T.A.F.F. bots. Had to find an extra Dance Pass just to get into the repair center in West Arcade.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ChicaBoss3_Description: SAFETY FIRST -  1) Fill the garbage compactor. 2) Prime the compactor engine by pushing the button in the kitchen storage room (follow the cable). 3) Press the hanging activation button in front of the compactor. IMPORTANT: Make sure all employees and S.T.A.F.F. are clear of the compactor before step 3.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ChicaBossUntitled2_Descr: SAFETY FIRST -  1) Fill the garbage compactor. 2) Prime the compactor engine by pushing the button in the storage room (follow the cable). 3) Press the hanging activation button in front of the compactor. IMPORTANT: Make sure all employees and S.T.A.F.F. are clear of the compactor before step 3.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Bonnieslastmovements_Des: SECURITY REPORT - 12:24AM - Bonnie is seen leaving his green room in Rockstar Row heading East towards the atrium. 2:40AM - Bonnie enters the East Arcade. 4:12AM - Bonnie enters Monty Golf.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_FalseAlarm_Description: SECURITY REPORT - A local police officer came by tonight. He said he was responding to an emergency call from someone inside the Pizzaplex. There is no way that is possible. I was the only one here and I certainly didn't make any outside calls. He wanted to look around, but I sent him away. Just another prank call.  - Vanessa
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_Stolenproperty_Descripti: SECURITY REPORT - Well somehow someone broke into a Rockstar Row display case and stole the wind up toy Music Man prototypes. The case was smashed and there's glass on the floor but no sign of a break in. Nothing else seems to be missing. I have absolutely no idea how they got into the building and there's nothing on the security footage. Now what should I do? Should I call the police and report a break in? - Vanessa
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_ACInspection_Description: Thank you for contacting Low Budget Building Contractors. We have done a preliminary inspection and find nothing wrong with your ventilation system. The "loud clanging", "banging" and "scraping" noises which were reported don't appear to be reproducable. Call us if it happens again. Invoice attached. - Keith
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_NoflashPhotography_Descr: WARNING: No flash photography. Items will be confiscated and kept in the Monty Golf security office.
Loc_EmployeeMessages.Loc_MessageData_MontyBoss3_Description: Where is everyone? Leo was the only one who had a copy of the maze control key, but I haven't seen him for months. Maybe that creepy bot knows where the key is. Leo was supposed to train it to work the maze, instead he tricked the bot into doing busy work under the daycare theater. I'll check after the all staff meeting tonight.

Loc_Instructions.Loc_Instruction_PartsAndService_ChicaUpg: to use Chica's Voice Box to stun the other animatronics.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_CallFreddy_Pr:
"I am sorry Gregory. I am out of power. I cannot help until
the recharge cycle is complete at the end of the hour."
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_CheckTheCamer: <btn id="SwitchCameras"/> to switch between cameras on the map.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_Stealth_Conte:
A <blue>BLUE</> outline means
you are not visible.

A <red>RED</> outline means
you have been <Bold>found</>.

A <yellow>YELLOW</> outline means
a bot is currently looking
for you.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_UseTheCameras: A red icon will appear when a camera sees a moving bot.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_ReCharge_Cont:
At the end of each hour, get into a Recharge Station or you
will get caught. Stations are marked on the Faz Map.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_UseFreddy_Con: Bots cannot find Gregory when he is controlling Freddy.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_RechargeFlash: But be careful, it takes some time to recharge!
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_ExitToExcape_: But be warned: the recharge stations are offline, so they cannot protect you.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FazWatch_Cont:
Cameras, messages, and more can be accessed through the watch.
WARNING - Time does not stop when looking at the Faz watch.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_OpenArm_C: Click on the arm to open the casing.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOffBo: Click on the bowtie to take it off.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOffCh: Click on the chest plate to take it off.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOutCl: Click on the claws to pull them out of the casing.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_PutInEyes: Click on the eyes to put them into Freddy's face.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOutEy: Click on the eyes to take them out of Freddy's face.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOffFa: Click on the nose to take it off.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PAS_TakeOutVo: Click on the voicebox to take it out of Freddy’s throat.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_KeepMoving_Co: Don’t let the bots catch you.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FlashlightRec: Find a flashlight station to recharge the flashlight.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FinishUpgrade: Finish the procedure by using the access computer.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FreddyOutOfPo:
Freddy is out of power.
He is unable to help until the start of the next hour.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_PartyPasses_C: Give party passes to STAFF BOTS to unlock areas of the Pizza Plex.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_SaveStation_C: It takes some time, so keep an eye out!
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_ReCharge_Titl: KEEP AN EYE ON THE TIME
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FlashBeacon_C: Must be recharged at flashlight station between uses.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_SurviveUntil6: OBJECTIVE: Return to the main exit at 6:00AM to escape.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_CallFreddy_Co: Press <btn id="CallFreddy"/> to call Freddy for help.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FazWatch_Cont: Press <btn id="FazWatch"/> to bring up the Faz Watch.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_NoiseMaker_Co: Press <btn id="Interact"/> to knock objects over and distract bots.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_HidingPlaces_: Press <btn id="Interact"/> when next to a hiding place to escape the bots.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_SwitchItems_C: Press <btn id="SubInventoryLeft"/> and <btn id="SubInventoryRight"/> to switch between items.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_SaveStation_C: Press and Hold <btn id="Interact"/> to save your progress
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_RechargeFlash: Press and hold <btn id="Interact"/> to recharge your flashlight
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_CollectPrizeB:
Prize boxes contain party passes, security badges and other helpful
items. Finding prize boxes is the key to surviving the night.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_SecurityBadge:
Security Badges allow access through numbered security doors.
The player's security level is tracked on the Fazwatch.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_Endo_Content: The Endos only move when you don't look at them! Get away or hide as soon as you can!
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_FlashlightRec: The flashlight is out of power.

Loc_Instructions.Loc_Instruction_PartsAndService_RoxyUpgr: Use Roxy’s Eyes to see things no one else can.
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_ExitToExcape_: Use an exit to escape the Pizzaplex!
Loc_Instructions.Loc_UI_HUD_InstructionCard_UseTheCameras:
Use the security cameras on the Faz watch to help find prize
boxes and avoid the animatronics.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00010: (Audio Tape 1-7139) <i>No one! Sometimes I talk with Luis, he's in the marketing department. He's nice, I guess.</>
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00005: (Audio Tape 1-7139) <i>What issue? I've been doing my job. I come in and sit and my desk and do my work.</>
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00001: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Hello, Vanessa. How are you feeling today? You look a little tired.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00002: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Hmm... Well, it's been a while since we last spoke. How's your anxiety been?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00007: (Audio Tape 1-7139) We have transcripts and I've read them, but it's not clear what you're talking about in these conversations. I can't make sense of it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00004: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Well, now I understand there's a new issue. It came on just recently? Rather suddenly? Can you tell me about it?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00009: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Who are you talking to in these?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00011: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Yes, I see Luis here, but there's someone else.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00006: (Audio Tape 1-7139) Yes, yes of course you do. Your performance reviews are good, but a routine check of your online history has revealed that you've spent quite a bit of time with someone in an encrypted conversation.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00003: (Audio Tape 1-7139) You did so well with your calming protocols when we first worked together. Are you still using those? Yes? Ok, good.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_1_7139_Line_00008: (Audio Tape 1-7139) You must be getting something from these that I'm not getting, right?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_10_7144_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 10-7144) <i>My work is important. There's a non-disclosure agreement.</>
(Audio Tape 10-7144) According to these message logs, you've been working pretty late over the last couple of weeks... Or not working.
(Audio Tape 10-7144) Are you ready to talk about who you're interacting with? From what I can see here the interaction is getting more serious.
(Audio Tape 10-7144) I'd say make yourself comfortable, but I think you already are. It looks like you could take a nap. That's a nice chair, isn't it?
(Audio Tape 10-7144) Is it distracting you from your work?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 11-7145) <i>He could be here or there or anywhere in-between.</>
(Audio Tape 11-7145) <i>I can't talk about this. He said he would always be watching.</>
(Audio Tape 11-7145) <i>I have! I compartmentalized him. He's locked away.</>
(Audio Tape 11-7145) Are you talking about your dad? Have those feelings come up again?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 11-7145) Hmm, well, ok. We'll get back to that. I'd really like to know something about this costume. What's it for?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 11-7145) I hate sounding like a broken record, but this is something you really need to resolve if you're ever going to be happy.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 11-7145) I know part of your job requires you to do online searches, but a routine audit of your search history has revealed that you're doing a little private searching on company time. Is that right?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 11-7145) No, that's not what I mean. You can't just ignore an issue. You have to face your memory of the experiences and process them so you can let it go.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 11-7145) Now, let's see what we can get done on this nice sunny day. Ok, here we go.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 11-7145) So you don't get triggered anymore. You can use a sort of self-dialogue to release these things.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 11-7145) That's true. So, on your breaks it looks like you were shopping for a costume.
(Audio Tape 11-7145) Well, I can't blame you for looking out the window instead of listening to me. It's a gorgeous day, isn't it?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 11-7145) What was that? Did you say the costume is a secret? Why is that?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_11_7145_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 11-7145) You purchased some fake fur material. What are you going to make?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_12_7146_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 12-7146) <i>I'm needed somewhere else now. Thank you.</>
(Audio Tape 12-7146) I don't just work with corporations. I work with individuals and small groups, I even work in schools. I'm wherever I'm needed.
(Audio Tape 12-7146) I understand you'll be transferring to a different location soon. I'll be sorry to see you go. I think we've been making progress, don't you?
(Audio Tape 12-7146) Our sessions don't have to be company mandated. I have all sorts of clients, Vanessa.
(Audio Tape 12-7146) You can request to come back and speak with me more on your own time though. Did you know that?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 13-4676) (Chuckles) Maybe I should be watching my back.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 13-4676) Apparently, I'm the fourth therapist you've had, and apparently all three of your former therapists have gone missing. Or, two of them are missing.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 13-4676) How does all of this make you feel?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 13-4676) I don't want to scare you, but I have to tell you that one of them was found dead.
(Audio Tape 13-4676) I get that. Lots of weird stuff outdoors, isn't there? Yeah, I understand.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 13-4676) I'm not clear on the circumstances. Apparently, the police don't have any evidence.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 13-4676) Nothing? Well... how do you feel about sports? You like sports? Yeah? No?

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 13-4676) That doesn't bother you either? Hmm... it's all pretty strange, I think.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 13-4676) That doesn't seem to upset you. Well then, I guess I'll go ahead and tell you that the woman's body was pretty messed up. It looked like it was mangled by machinery.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_13_4676_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 13-4676) Yeah, that's funny, isn't it? Ok, shall we move on to something lighter?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_14_4677_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 14-4677) Although, I'll admit I don't see any proof here. Seems like they have more of a gut feeling than fact. But apparently the hacks are causing all kinds of problems.
(Audio Tape 14-4677) But seriously, I have to say that I think it's weird that you'd spend so much time in such a busy, social place. You seem like more of a loner to me.

(Audio Tape 14-4677) Hmm, you get a kick out of that? The idea of techs running around like chickens with their heads cut off? Yeah, that's a funny image, isn't it?
(Audio Tape 14-4677) I'll take your silence as a yes. And besides, I know you know it. Because the technicians who work for Pizzaplex know you.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_14_4677_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 14-4677) Lots of time by yourself instead of with friends. Lots of time talking to yourself, right?
(Audio Tape 14-4677) Nothing to say about that? Well, the techs are convinced that you've hacked into their system many times.
(Audio Tape 14-4677) Or rather, I guess it would be better to say that they think they do.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_14_4677_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 14-4677) The program asks you questions and prompts you for responses. It's kind of like your own self therapy, isn't it? Another way of talking to yourself to work things out, right?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_14_4677_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 14-4677) They report that they have caught you on camera, or at least it appears to be you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_14_4677_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 14-4677) When I read what they found, at first, I thought I was looking at more examples of you just talking with yourself, then I realized it was different.
(Audio Tape 14-4677) When I saw some of your recent encrypted conversation logs, that's what I thought I was looking at.
(Audio Tape 14-4677) When I study this, it sounds like there is someone else responding to you. Who is it?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 15-4678) Apparently, the techs were reviewing communications going in and out of this building and they came across some interesting things.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 15-4678) Disguises let you be sort of invisible, don't they?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 15-4678) I don't think you're being manipulated here. I think you're the one doing the manipulating.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 15-4678) That's you, isn't it? I know this image is distorted, but I think it looks like you. And you're not alone here.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 15-4678) The thing is, when I read the communications, I get something different out of them.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 15-4678) What are those things? They almost look like rabbit ears.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0001: (Audio Tape 15-4678) What do you think about that?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 15-4678) What? You find that amusing? Well, I guess it is.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 15-4678) What? You wanna hold it? Ok.
(Audio Tape 15-4678) Yeah? You like that idea, huh?
(Audio Tape 15-4678) You can get away with almost anything when you're invisible, can't you? (chuckles).
(Audio Tape 15-4678) You like the idea of being disguised?
(Audio Tape 15-4678) You think it's a mask? It reminds you of a mask? Like a disguise? Yeah, I can see that.
(Audio Tape 15-4678) You wanna do one? Yes? Ok. How about this one?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_15_4678_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 15-4678) You're talking to someone, or something, it's hard to tell.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 16-4679) And I'm not going to pretend to understand everything I'm reading here, but what I get is that the system wide glitch was like a cascade that was broadcasting a very dangerous message.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 16-4679) Fine, you can look at the floor all you want, but it won't change the fact that none of what you said in your file about your parents was true.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 16-4679) Thanks, but it's really not that funny.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 16-4679) The techs have been struggling to fix some serious glitches with the robots.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 16-4679) The truth is, you had great parents, a great childhood.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0002: (Audio Tape 16-4679) Well, I can understand why you might feel angry about the way I just confronted you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_Play_Tape_16_4679_Line_0000: (Audio Tape 16-4679) While the techs were trying to reprogram the system to remove the glitch, the source of the glitch shifted.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00157: (Freddy) Gregory, I do not know what you did, but the lights are out in the Daycare! You need to find the emergency backup generators and turn them on. They are in the play structures.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00054: (Freddy) Gregory, I have identified two possible exit points. The main loading dock is located under the food court on the first floor. There is also a fire escape in the third floor Prize Counter. Check your Fazwatch. I will mark both locations on your Faz Map.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00130: (Freddy) Gregory, I know why you are not in the customer database... I remember you from the....
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00043: (Freddy) Gregory, Jump in! We need to get out of here now. They have found you!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00245: (Freddy) Gregory, are you certain you have seen a dancing rabbit lady? I believe you if you say you have, but it is highly unlikely. I have not seen her and she does not sound like a character we have at the Pizzaplex.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00238: (Freddy) Gregory, are you sure? Some would call this a point of no return.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00220: (Freddy) Gregory, as soon as it is safe, return to Parts and Service. You have the spare parts necessary to begin an upgrade procedure.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00241: (Freddy) Gregory, be careful. This elevator does not appear to follow any safety protocols. I do not think it can survive more than one trip.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00218: (Freddy) Gregory, did you read that message? It said there is a bag of Monty Mystery Mix behind the Bowling alley. Chica goes coo coo for Monty Mystery Mix.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00235: (Freddy) Gregory, good news! It is almost 6 o'clock. You will be safe now if you find an exit. But hurry! The Daycare Attendant is loose one last time.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00081: (Freddy) Gregory, my systems are failing. Go to the sound booth on the third floor balcony. Run the performance program on that disk then meet me back on the stage. Please hurry. You do not have much time. It is almost the end of the hour. I will wait here.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00244: (Freddy) Gregory, please. We should stick together.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00195: (Freddy) Gregory, that Party Pass is very special. It will let you into Fazer Blast or Monty Golf. However, it can only be used once.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00100: (Freddy) Gregory, those parts belong to my friends. I would never do anything to hurt them.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00178: (Freddy) Gregory, you have a choice to make. The door is open and you can go. Or you can continue to investigate the secrets of the Pizzaplex. I feel there is something else going on besides Vanny.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00178b: (Freddy) Gregory, you have a choice to make. The door is open and you can go. Or you can continue to investigate the secrets of the Pizzaplex. I feel there is something else going on besides the dancing rabbit lady.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00121: (Freddy) Gregory. Check out these shirts. Which one do you like best?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00159: (Freddy) Gregory. I am too big to go through vents.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00205: (Freddy) Gregory. I do not mean to be intrusive, but I read that message that you found in the security office. There may be a chance to stop Monty from hunting you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00242: (Freddy) Gregory. I have a bad feeling. I do not wish to go down there. If we do, do not expect to return. This is your decision. Are you ready?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00008: (Freddy) Gregory. I will notify the main office. Huh, connection error. I cannot connect to the main network.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00233: (Freddy) Gregory. The security system knows you are here and has locked you out. Reset the breakers and restore power to the West Arcade, then you can repair the S.T.A.F.F. bot head.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00106: (Freddy) Gregory. This upgrade... It was Chica's. Please, be honest. How did you get it?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00070: (Freddy) Gregory? What did you do? Something happened. I can communicate again. I think you fixed my signal. Thank you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00229: (Freddy) Have you checked the party garages? The raceway was closed very abruptly prior to the new construction. Guests tend to leave things behind during emergency situations.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00161: (Freddy) He is trying to take control of me. I do not think I can fight it for long.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00231: (Freddy) Head to the security office. You'll find the S.T.A.F.F. bot repair machine there.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00014: (Freddy) Hello, Gregory. It is me, Freddy. I will escort you to the main entrance. However, I am unable to leave this room. There is a button that will open the maintenance closet, but I have been programmed not to notice it. It should be around here somewhere.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00014b: (Freddy) Hello, Gregory. It is me, Freddy. I will escort you to the main entrance. However, I am unable to leave this room. You should have no problem. There is a button on the wall that will open the door to the back room. I will make it accessible to you now.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00246: (Freddy) Hello? Is someone there? I am afraid I can not see you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00068: (Freddy) Help me get to Parts and Service.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00236: (Freddy) Hey superstars! It's me, Freddy! Welcome to the Mega Pizzaplex! Grab a jumbo slice of pepperoni and top it off with an ice cold Fizzy Faz. Then enjoy our super games and attractions. Don't forget to stop by Rockstar Row and meet me in person! Have fun and have a Faz-eriffic day!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00105: (Freddy) How fortunate. I should now be able to smash through the cyclone fences around the building the way Monty does.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00036: (Freddy) How unfortunate, Gregory. You missed your chance, but there is still hope. You should be able to escape when the security doors reopen at 6:00am. Until then, keep moving and try not to draw attention to yourself. If there is another way out, I will help you find it. I promise.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00059: (Freddy) How unfortunate. But I have good news: It looks like you can access the Fazbear online pizza delivery system through that console!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00089: (Freddy) How unfortunate. Head past the Superstar-cade wall, to the back of the arcade. There is a roll up door at the very back which leads to the Prize Counter.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00185: (Freddy) How unfortunate. If you re-attach my head I will go look for him now.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00181: (Freddy) How unfortunate. The Save Spots have been hacked. They are no longer usable.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00074: (Freddy) Hurry Gregory! I cannot stop her.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00024: (Freddy) I am detecting blood. You are injured.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00109: (Freddy) I am having a hard time adjusting. You look different to me. I can see movement through the walls.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00013: (Freddy) I am sending you an encoded message.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00226: (Freddy) I am so sorry. It appears you are not tall enough to ride the karts alone. You will need a working driver assist bot in order to use this kart.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00022: (Freddy) I am sorry Gregory. I would love to do a tour, but it is closing time and this door is locked. Look for a door with my icon on it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00140: (Freddy) I am sorry Gregory. You did not make it out in time. That is unfortunate. The main entrance will not open again until 6 am. Think of it as a slumber party. Or a "Lock-In". That is a party where you lock all the children in a building then have a slumber party. No one is allowed to enter or leave. It is fun. Fazbear Entertainment no longer hosts Lock-Ins... for legal reasons.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00094: (Freddy) I am sorry, Gregory. I am in no condition to carry you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00038: (Freddy) I am sorry, Gregory. I am truly sorry.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00031: (Freddy) I am terribly sorry. The recharge cycle had not yet completed when I found you. You must continue without me. I will guide you on your Fazwatch in case you get into any trouble.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00224: (Freddy) I am very glad you made it to the recharge station, Gregory.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00126: (Freddy) I cannot believe you were able to collect enough toys to become a VIP.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00221: (Freddy) I could open this gate if I had Monty's claws.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00118: (Freddy) I do not come up here anymore. I miss him.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00050: (Freddy) I do not know. I want to help you. Maybe they want to help you too.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00098: (Freddy) I do not know. I was holding it when I rebooted. You can use it to open the gates to one of the many attractions. But it can only be used once. You will have to find additional Party Passes to access the other attractions.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00115: (Freddy) I have never been allowed in here before. This must be where I was born. Look at all the endos. They are all the same... Have I always been a Freddy? Am I Monty with a different shell? What if I am not the first Glamrock Freddy? Are there more of me at other pizzerias? Do we all feel the same? Am I special? If I am mass produced, am I still art?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00096: (Freddy) I have something for you. Take it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00132: (Freddy) I hear what some guests say about me. Bad things happened in the past. But that was not me. Those were older models - Flawed. I would never hurt anyone. You know that, right?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00020: (Freddy) I know how to get you out of here. Climb back into my chest cavity.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00122: (Freddy) I know what this is. I have been here before. She brought me here. I found myself for the first time when I cleared the path. I did not want to, but I had no choice. Now, I have a choice. I have changed. My friends are here. They are so angry... confused... but I can protect you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00230: (Freddy) I must stay here. I wish I could join you, but after tonight's stage incident, I am not allowed to perform. When I step onto the West Arcade dance floor, I cannot stop myself. It is a programming bug.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00062: (Freddy) I must warn you: when you enter an area where you do not have a locator map signal, I will be unable to reach your location. You can update your mini-map at a security office. Be safe.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00028: (Freddy) I said nothing. I will keep you safe. Let us go.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00004: (Freddy) I still do not see you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00037: (Freddy) I wonder what the free prize is?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00227: (Freddy) I would love to drive with you, but I am too big.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00091b: (Freddy) If you feel you are in danger, close the doors but you can not keep them closed forever. There is limited power available during a lockdown. If you run out of power, the doors will no longer close. I suggest you only close the doors when absolutely necessary.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00066: (Freddy) If you get this message, come to the Roxy Raceway entrance on the second floor. I piled up some boxes so you can hop over the construction fence and find me. Something is jamming my communications signal. Come to the Roxy Raceway...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00214: (Freddy) If you have not done so already, you should check the Fazer Blast Office.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00232: (Freddy) If you see the DJ, say "Hello." He is such a nice fellow.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00091a: (Freddy) In the meantime, stay where you are. That noise is bound to draw attention. If you leave the office, you will be easier to find.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00055: (Freddy) It appears that you have no Faz Map. You should be able to obtain one from the greeter on the center balcony.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00097: (Freddy) It is a Freddy Fazbear PARTY PASS.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00223: (Freddy) It is almost the end of the hour! Get to a recharge station, Gregory, before the Daycare Attendant comes!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00069: (Freddy) It is down under the main stage. Normally, the stage lift takes me down there after every concert. That is really the only way I know how.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00056: (Freddy) It looks like you do not have security clearance to access the kitchen. Find the open vent near the salad bar to bypass security.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00061: (Freddy) It looks like you will need to use an after hours Party Pass to access the Prize Counter. Of course, you could access the Prize Counter through the East Arcade. Good news! It looks like the door to El Chip's is open.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00196: (Freddy) Just give it to a Party bot. They usually stay in front of the attractions collecting Party Passes. If you have one, it will let you in. I have marked both locations on your map.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00189: (Freddy) Just reconnect the wires and be careful. I am not quite myself at the moment.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00112: (Freddy) Look for a security Office. There should be a map and a security badge.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00197: (Freddy) Look for the Security Office in the back hallway. Since there is no flash photography allowed in Monty Golf, Faz Cams are often confiscated here. Mainly because they are only sold in Monty Golf. It is a very clever marketing plan.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00243: (Freddy) Look, that Save Spot is working. If anything happens we will return to this spot.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00206: (Freddy) Monty loves hanging out on the catwalks. You can find the entrance in Mazercise.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00219: (Freddy) Monty's mystery mix. The mystery is the pizza flavoring.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00104: (Freddy) My arms are different. Where did you get these parts?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00128: (Freddy) My finger doubles as a lighter. You know, for birthday candles. And Crème Brûlée.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00005: (Freddy) My stomach hatch? That place is reserved for oversized birthday cakes and piñatas! It is not a safe play area!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00048: (Freddy) No, I did not. There is no rabbit at the Mega Pizzaplex... Not anymore.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00025a: (Freddy) No, I feel that something is wrong. I am taking you to the first aid station.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00123: (Freddy) No. I can not exit outside of this facility.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00225: (Freddy) Now that I have been upgraded, I should be able to access the Roxy Raceway. I have not been there for a very long time, but perhaps you can find some clues on how to deal with Roxy while you are there.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00026: (Freddy) Officer Vanessa, I do not know how I got here.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00017: (Freddy) Oh? You are going to need a Photo Pass to open the door. Apologies, I assumed you had one already... Well, you should be able to find one at a convenience counter.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00142: (Freddy) Otherwise, I have compiled a list of 5 suggestions to help you through the night.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00119: (Freddy) Perhaps if you adjusted the heat in the boiler room, you could melt it. The boiler room is down in the utilidors. I will mark it on your map. However, I do not recommend you go there.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00039: (Freddy) Perhaps there is a way to hack it back out. Try Glamrock Gifts. They have lots of trinkets, knickknacks, and doodads.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00173: (Freddy) Please. you do not want to do this.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00194: (Freddy) Quick, find a recharge station. You should be able to see their locations on the map.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00083: (Freddy) Quickly. Get to the re-charge station! Follow me.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00085: (Freddy) Routine maintenance. I am functioning much more better... now. Grammar function error... Perhaps I am still not at peak performance.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00007: (Freddy) Scanning complete. How odd. Your guest profile is unknown to me. Who are you?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00212: (Freddy) Shame on you, Gregory. We cannot enter together. That would be cheating. I am programmed not to cheat.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00001: (Freddy) Showtime already?! I am experiencing a malfunction. The recharge cycle is not complete.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00209: (Freddy) So. There is a vent in this maze that leads to the Monty Golf catwalks. I believe there is a control panel for the maze around here somewhere.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00087b: (Freddy) Something is not right. Someone must have changed the permissions. You are going to need a much higher security level to get out that way. Come back to me right away.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00146: (Freddy) Suggestion number four; You need to hide in a recharge station at the end of every hour. I will meet you there. You can also call me from your Fazwatch at any time to help... as long as I can find you and have power remaining.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00143: (Freddy) Suggestion number one; Look for prize boxes that have been hidden throughout the building. They should have helpful items to get you through the night.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00145: (Freddy) Suggestion number three; You must stay hidden and keep moving until the Lobby doors open at 6:00am.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00144: (Freddy) Suggestion number two; If you find a party pass, give it to the "Party Staff" to access the attractions after hours.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00012: (Freddy) Take this. It is a novelty Freddy Fazwatch.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00148: (Freddy) Thank you for taking the time to listen, Gregory. I wish you luck. The security doors will open in 3... 2... 1...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00198: (Freddy) That is a Faz Cam. If you are in trouble, use the camera flash to stun the other animatronics. Keep in mind that it will not work on Monty, due to his sunglasses.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00047: (Freddy) That is a fountain. A fountain is a decorative reservoir used for discharging water.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00108: (Freddy) That is a relief. With this new voice box, I should be able to make a vocal pitch that will stun animatronics.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00041: (Freddy) That is great news! I will meet you in the daycare. The entrance is on the second floor balcony.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00184: (Freddy) That is great news. He can be returned to his parents.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00114: (Freddy) That is not possible. You must be mistaken. An Endo cannot function without its shell.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00010: (Freddy) That is the security guard. She can help!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00237: (Freddy) That was not me. That was a recording. I want to make sure you are not confused.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00156: (Freddy) The Atrium is locked. You will need to upgrade your ticket to get inside. Find the upgrade machine in Customer Service.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00143a: (Freddy) The Freddy Fazbear mega Pizzaplex deluxe lock-in birthday scavenger hunt package is normally reserved for special birthday kids. We will make an exception in your case... seeing as how you are not the birthday boy.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00091c: (Freddy) The cameras on your Fazwatch should help.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00164: (Freddy) The doors will not hold her.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00203: (Freddy) The security office is nearby. You might want to look around the office and see if there is a way to stop Monty from hunting you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00179: (Freddy) There is also something strange happening in Fazer Blast. I do not know what it is, but I can take you there if you wish to investigate.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00016: (Freddy) There is nothing to be scared of. You can do it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00021: (Freddy) There is still time, but we must hurry. If I am spotted, I will certainly be taken back to my room. I will escort you to the main exit through the utility tunnels. It is the safest path.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00101: (Freddy) There must be a good explanation. They are not capable of hurting a guest. None of us are. It would go against our programming.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00120: (Freddy) There must be a problem with the main generator. Until power has been restored, I am afraid it will remain dark. Many doors will not function properly. Your Fazwatch should still work, though. I have marked the location of the generator on your map.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00067: (Freddy) There you are! I was so worried. I waited and waited for you. I missed the hourly recharge and have been trying to get down to Parts and Service. I think something is wrong.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00235b: (Freddy) These eyes are amazing! There are wondrous colors and objects I never knew existed. Nothing can hide from me now!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00037a: (Freddy) These turnstiles require a Complimentary Pizzaplex Entry Pass. There should be one located near the main entrance.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00090: (Freddy) They are... required safety measures due to past issues. Look for another way in.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00095: (Freddy) This is the Parts and Service center. When any of the band members have technical problems, we are sent here for maintenance. We also receive software upgrades... when our behaviors need correction.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00222: (Freddy) This requires Chica's voice to activate.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00087: (Freddy) Those are the loading dock controls.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00035: (Freddy) Those boxes on your mini-map are nearby security cameras. When movement is detected by the camera's motion sensors, you should see red alert icons. Switch between the cameras to find a safe path out of the office and to the main lobby.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00040a: (Freddy) Try that terrible magnet you found.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00069a: (Freddy) Use that door behind me. It will take you to the rehearsal room on the other side of the building. Look for a Backstage Pass then find a way to turn on the lift.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00192: (Freddy) Use the service elevators at the back of the room. They go up to Rockstar Row. It looks like they are all out of order except for Roxy's.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00186: (Freddy) Vanessa, all the Fazwatches sound like me. It is the default voice option.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00187: (Freddy) Vanessa, do not leave me like this.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00019: (Freddy) Way to go, superstar! I knew you could do it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00045: (Freddy) We are almost out of time. We need to get to a recharge station immediately. Every hour the power is diverted to the recharge stations. When that happens the lights go out, and when <i>that</> happens the Daycare attendant is free to roam the building. It <i>will</> find you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00029: (Freddy) We are now under the Pizzaplex. These utility tunnels connect all the attractions.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00053: (Freddy) We should get moving. You can access the main atrium with your new security badge.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00015: (Freddy) Well done, Gregory. There is an open air vent inside the maintenance room. You will have to climb through the ventilation system and release me from the outside.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00088: (Freddy) Well done, Gregory. You are in the East Arcade. You should be able to get to the Prize Counter through the security office. Look for the door with a security badge symbol on it.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00032: (Freddy) Well done, Gregory. You found a security office. You should be quite safe here. The doors were designed to keep our highly-trained security staff safe in the event of an emergency. As long as the doors stay closed, which they will, as long as there is ample power...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00213: (Freddy) Well done, superstar! You won the Fazerblaster. Now, go collect your prize from the Superstar Lounge.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00154: (Freddy) Well done, superstar. You have accessed the Lobby. Unfortunately, that complimentary entry ticket does not allow you to enter the pizzeria.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00057: (Freddy) Well done. You are near the Fizzy Faz syrup vats. You should be able to find your way to the Main Kitchen from here.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00217: (Freddy) What amazing luck. You got an annual Bonnie Bowl unlimited pass. Free bowling for a whole year! Mega Pizzaplex entry not included. Shoe and ball rental fees still apply.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_FREDDY_00131: (Freddy) Whatever it is, do not let it find you.

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_PIZZABOT_00004: (Pizzabot) Now it is time for the "not meat" stuff.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_PIZZABOT_00005: (Pizzabot) Time to bake. An oven would be ideal.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_PIZZABOT_00001: (Pizzabot) Umm. Delicious dough. This dough needs some sauce.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00013: (Roxy) Do you really think we won't find you?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00057: (Roxy) Don't be a loser! Get back out there!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00056: (Roxy) Freddy, get out of my room.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00009: (Roxy) Hey Kid, come on out. We're only trying to help.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00003: (Roxy) Hey. I'm Roxanne Wolf. If you're looking for high speed motor mayhem, Roxy Raceway is the place to be. Sign up today and be a winner! Nobody likes a loser.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00035: (Roxy) I bet you don't even have friends...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00026: (Roxy) I can't see you, but I can hear you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00048: (Roxy) I just need a little work done.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00054: (Roxy) It's not fair. He must be cheating.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00052: (Roxy) It's not your fault. That kid's just lucky.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00045: (Roxy) Keep searching. He can't hide forever.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00005: (Roxy) My face! My face! My face!!!!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00015: (Roxy) On your marks. Get set. Go!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00004: (Roxy) Roxy Raceway is closed for seasonal maintenance. Come back soon!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00053: (Roxy) We should have found him by now.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00027: (Roxy) Why are you hiding from me?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00010: (Roxy) You might as well give up.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00017: (Roxy) You think you're better than me?!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00044: (Roxy) You're the best. You will find him first.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00002: (Roxy) Your fans are watching you right now... I know.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ROXY_00001: (Roxy) Your performance was perfect tonight. Thank you. Your hair is beautiful. Your tail is beautiful. Everyone was watching you. Everyone loves you. Everyone wants to be you. You are the best. Thank you. I am the best. I am the best.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00002: (Rules Bot) Aim for the glowing targets on your opponent's vest and pull the trigger. Successfully shooting your opponent will deactivate your opponent's weapons for 5 seconds. Based on the color of the target you will receive between 1 to 100 points.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00009: (Rules Bot) Before you can enter the arena, you need to grab a helmet and Faz Blaster.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00007: (Rules Bot) By listening to these instructions, you have waived all rights and ability to make any claims against Fazbear Entertainment. Any accidents or injuries are your sole responsibility or a shared responsibility between you and any associated party involved in said incident.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00005: (Rules Bot) Do you want to hear the rules again?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00014: (Rules Bot) Great job! You qualified to enter the Superstar Club! Come in and take a souvenir Fazer Blast prize.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00015: (Rules Bot) Hold on, soldier! Return your equipment to the rack to exit.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00008: (Rules Bot) Now get in there and fight, fight, fight!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00016: (Rules Bot) Return your gear or I will be forced to call security.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00004: (Rules Bot) Rule number two: Have fun!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00003: (Rules Bot) There are two rules you must follow at all times. Rule number one: No running. No climbing. No jumping. No hitting, kicking, pushing, shoving. No shooting faz blasters in, near or close to other player's eyes. Being flashed in the eyes may induce seizures, blindness or semi-permanent paralysis. If you are flashed in the eyes, immediately flush your eyes with soap and water then blink repeatedly until vision is restored.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00013: (Rules Bot) Too bad. You can press the "reset" button to try again..
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00006: (Rules Bot) Warning: FAZER BLAST is a high energy space combat simulation. People with medical conditions are allowed to participate. My medical software makes me a qualified doctor and I approve of this message.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00011: (Rules Bot) You are on the blue team, soldier. Report to the Blue hallway!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00010: (Rules Bot) You are on the orange team, soldier. Report to the Orange hallway!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_RULESBOT_00001: (Rules Bot) You must be the new FAZER BLAST recruits and from the looks of you, the orange/blue team hasn't got a chance. Soon you will be fighting for your lives on a hostile alien planet. But first, I am here to tell you how to play "FAZER BLAST".
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SALESBOT_00004: (Salesbot) I sell things that you want.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SENTRYBOT_00001: (Sentry Bot) Have you seen this boy?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SENTRYBOT_00003: (Sentry Bot) I am a security officer.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SENTRYBOT_00008: (Sentry Bot) I am looking for intruders.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SENTRYBOT_00006: (Sentry Bot) The customer is always right.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_STAFFBOT_000001: (Staff Bot) A child that small doesn't have a cloaking device.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_STAFFDAD_00003: (Staff Dad) I do not know what I was thinking. I was compelled to leave my post.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_STAFFMOM_00004: (Staff Mom) May you be happy in the life you have chosen.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_STAFFMOM_00003: (Staff Mom) This is no longer working. I am leaving. I am taking the children.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_STAFFMOM_00002: (Staff Mom) What about the children? We have a down payment on a new closet.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00004a: (Sun) Don't you want a puppet show? I have glitter glue! Do you like glitter glue? Googly eyes?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00001a: (Sun) Helloooo! New friend! You're sure up late! Are we having a slumber party? Where are all of your friends?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00002: (Sun) Hey, hey, are ya having fun yet? Are ya? Are ya?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00006b: (Sun) I'm putting you in time out!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00004: (Sun) New friend, this- this area is off-limits. You're gonna get us in trouble.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00002a: (Sun) No, no no. Where are you going? STAY right here and make crafts!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00003: (Sun) No, no, no, no! What a mess! Oh, which was the bottom? Where is the top? Clean up! Clean up!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00005: (Sun) No- no! Why would you do that? Lights on! Lights on! I warned you- I WARNED YOU!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00006: (Sun) Rule-breaker! Rule-breaker! You are banned from the Daycare.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00007: (Sun) Security alert! Security alert! Wooo! Woooo!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00001c: (Sun) There is only one rule: keep the lights on. ON. On...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SUN_00001b: (Sun) We can finger paint, tell stories, drink Fizzy Faz until our heads ex-PLODE and stay up all night!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_SWEEPERBOT_00003: (Sweeperbot) The floor is not going to clean itself.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00037: (Vanessa) ... I found him earlier and locked him up in Lost and Found.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00024: (Vanessa) Come on out, you little monster.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00026: (Vanessa) Come on, kid! I don't have all night.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00030b: (Vanessa) Come out, come out wherever you are...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00012: (Vanessa) Contact me if you see him.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00002: (Vanessa) Freddy! You're supposed to be on lockdown.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00042: (Vanessa) Gregory, I think you deserve a reward. Go check the main stage.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00038: (Vanessa) He can't. Turns out, there's no record of him.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00001: (Vanessa) Hello? Little boy? If you're down here, say something!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00041: (Vanessa) Hey, little man. Do you know what time it is? The doors are open. Why are you still here? You plan on moving in or you just want a job? Maybe join the internship program? You would make a great security guard.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00039: (Vanessa) His name is Gregory... You know how I know that? His Fazwatch kept repeating it. In your voice... "Gregory? Are you there? Gregory?"
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00028: (Vanessa) I bet your parents are worried about you.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00023: (Vanessa) I don't have time for this!
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00032: (Vanessa) I don't know how to fix it. What am I going to do? If Freddy was working, we'd have him by now. Okay. I didn't mean to. He walks through every security door as if he owns the place. No. I can find him. It won't be like the last one.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00008: (Vanessa) I'll bet you think you're real clever, Gregory. Yeah, I know your name. You're in big trouble! This is <i>not</> the night to be wasting my time. So, you are going to wait right there in Lost and Found until your parents or the police arrive.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00009: (Vanessa) I'm sorry. I think we lost him...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00036: (Vanessa) I've looked everywhere? It's not here.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00040: (Vanessa) If you're part of this, you're scrap. Monty will run the shows, until Parts and Service can slap your casing on a new Endo. Hang out here for a while. I gotta find that kid.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00034: (Vanessa) Look, I don't know where it is. Do you know how many arcade games there are?
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00004: (Vanessa) Ok... Look, we're like 15 minutes from closing and some kid is sneaking around backstage. If you see anything, notify me immediately. I already alerted the others. Now, go back to your room.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00003: (Vanessa) Well, you totally blew it tonight, you know. Your system crashed and you ruined the show. Now, Parts and Service have you on reduced power. They said it's a safety precaution. Just one more thing to deal with...
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_VANESSA_00025: (Vanessa) You're in such big trouble, mister.
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ForeverAndEver_00001_Line_0: Hey everybody, put the radio on Time to throw our troubles awa-aa-ay

We're bringin' all our buddies, it's time for a jam Gonna play 'til our worries are go-oo-one

Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ForeverAndEver_00002_Line_0: We're hoppin' into the jalopy, gonna go for a ride To the pizza shop with our frie-e-ends
We're jumpin' and a-rockin' 'til the sun goes down And the moon is shinin'...forever and ever
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ForeverAndEver_00003_Line_0: We're rockin' and rollin', our friends are all here Got our ice cream sundaes and flo-oo-oats
Loc_Subtitles.Loc_Subtitle_ForeverAndEver_00001_Line_0: We're turnin' up the music! We're havin' a ball! This band keeps rockin'...forever and ever
